bridge-type.label: Serial Connection
bridge-type.description: This bridge represents the serial connection to the alarm system.

parameter.name: serialPort
parameter.label: Serial Port
parameter.description: The serial port to use for connecting to the serial interface of the alarm system e.g. COM1 for Windows and /dev/ttyS0 or /dev/ttyUSB0 for Linux.

parameter.name: motionOffDelay
parameter.label: Motion Reset Delay
parameter.description: The delay in minutes to reset a motion detection.

parameter.name: allowArming
parameter.label: Allow Arming
parameter.description: Enable or disable arming the alarm system from openHAB.

parameter.name: allowDisarming
parameter.label: Allow Disarming
parameter.description: Enable or disable disarming the alarm system from openHAB.

parameter.name: pinCode
parameter.label: PIN Code
parameter.description: The PIN code to use for arming/disarming the alarm system from openHAB. Not required except when Powerlink mode cannot be used.

parameter.name: forceStandardMode
parameter.label: Force Standard Mode
parameter.description: Force the standard mode rather than trying using the Powerlink mode.

parameter.name: panelType
parameter.label: Panel Type
parameter.description: Define the panel type. Only required when forcing the standard mode.

parameter.name: autoSyncTime
parameter.label: Sync Time
parameter.description: Automatic sync time at openHAB startup.
